fields.about: Experienced medical assistant with expertise in patient care coordination and administrative tasks. Fluent in Arabic and English, with strong organizational skills.
fields.education:
Medical Assistant Certificate - Damascus Medical Institute (2020)
Healthcare Administration Diploma - Syrian Virtual University (2021)
CPR and First Aid Certification - Red Crescent Society (2022)

fields.about: Dedicated pediatric medical assistant with special training in child care and family communication. Experienced in managing pediatric appointments and patient records.
fields.education:
Pediatric Medical Assistant - Children's Hospital Damascus (2021)
Child Development Certificate - Damascus University (2022)
Medical Records Management - Syrian Medical Association (2023)

fields.about: Skilled orthopedic medical assistant with experience in surgical coordination and post-operative care. Proficient in medical terminology and patient education.
fields.education:
Surgical Medical Assistant - Al-Assad University Hospital (2019)
Orthopedic Care Specialist - Jordan Medical Council (2020)
Patient Education Certificate - World Health Organization (2021)
